name: Leviathan: The Card Game
description:
The world of "Leviathan" is now officially a card game!

Enjoy a quick-paced multiplayer card game inspired by card games such as "Hearthstone", and "Yu-Gi-Oh!"

UPDATE V1.2.1 FEATURES:

- 70+ cards

- 29 HERO cards

- Unique soundtrack

- 3 different playing fields

- Deck customization

- Easy multiplayer functionality

- AI opponent for offline play

- Interesting cards and effects

+MORE
